"Oh? You also came to visit Dad and ever: "Thanks. I'm sure they're happy to see you."
"Hahhh...."
"What's up?"
"You're sighing again."
"Ah, well, you know..."
"Oh... Yeah, I guess I did do that last time."

"I was just thinking,
\"I knew teaching people wasn't going to be easy\"..."

"Recently, after reading over the Instructor's operations manual
who knows how many times, I've started to get a feel for my own teaching style."
"I also paid Meri a visit, who told me about how Rysas taught everyone."
"I also tried my hand at ascertaining everyone's individual talents, but..."

"When I told everyone to do as they pleased, a few of them
took my words a bit too literally..."

"I'd try to say \"No, not like that\",
but they wouldn't listen anymore..."

"It's just not in me to be a strict teacher,
but I also know the way I'm doing things right now isn't working..."

"...Mmm...
I'm going to keep thinking on it a bit longer."
"Thanks for letting me vent."

"So yeah...
I'm gonna get going."

"We're about to head into Retem for some
Scout and Recon training in a few days."

"It'll be a long journey, so if I don't make sure
everyone's prepared, it could actually be dangerous..."
"I've gotta find a solution before then."
"Anyways, I'll see you around."
